short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy Raw as cURL to clipboard. Just click on Raw block or double click a raw from http://localhost:4040/inspect/http.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on Raw block or double-click on request line from your localhost Ngrok inspector to copy cURL command on clipboard.
